title: Strategies for Leveraging Interactive Video Learning Effects in STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital learning tools and general comprehension of STEM education
context.additional_context: STEM education competency enhancement program linked to language curricula for corporate managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core features of interactive videos (embedded quizzes, navigation controls, feedback systems)
Learners can propose three or more instructional design strategies for delivering STEM content using interactive videos
Learners can compare the effectiveness of interactive videos against traditional video-based learning using performance data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
